content: व्यपदेशः {@--1@} Representation, information, notice. {@--2@} Designation by name, naming. {@--3@} A name, an appellation, a title; एवंव्यपदेशभाजः <ls>U. 6.</ls> {@--4@} A family, race; अथ कोस्य व्यपदेशः <ls>Ś. 7</ls>; व्यपदेशमाविलयितुं किमीहसे जनमिमं च पातयितुं <ls>Ś. 5. 21.</ls> {@--5@} Fame, reputation, renown. {@--6@} A trick, pretext, excuse, device. {@--7@} Fraud, craft. {@--8@} Concealment, dissimulation; Mal. {7}
